title: Icon
body: I played Doom Bots but never recieved the icon for it course i "won" and i also gifted someone within 11/3/2016 which allows you to get another icon the pumpkin one..

replies.body:
We're sending icons out until *November 17th*, so if you don't have anything *after then*, please hit our specialists up in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
i'm playing a game today 10:30 am eastern 11/6/2016 and ivern's ultimate is not walking it kept glitching through units..
